Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagChromeMusicWindowDirectionalInput_Staged

Added_Other.name: FFlagDisableFullscreenToastWhenNotPointer_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Disables fullscreen notifications when the mouse pointer is not active.
Added_Other.purpose: Reduces distractions during gameplay by minimizing unnecessary pop-ups.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAudioTremolo_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables a sound effect that modulates audio pitch and volume dynamically.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides a richer audio experience by adding depth to sound effects in games.

Added_Input.name: FFlagEnableEmbeddedGamepadCheck_Staged
Added_Input.mechanism: Enables a built-in check for gamepad support within the game.
Added_Input.purpose: Allows players to use gamepads seamlessly without extra setup.

Added_Input.name: FFlagGamepadPreferredWhenKeyboardPending_Staged
Added_Input.mechanism: Prioritizes gamepad input when keyboard input is expected but not yet received.
Added_Input.purpose: Provides a smoother gaming experience for players using gamepads.
